title: Router: Deploy (vendor-neutral)
description: Routes deploy intents to vendor-neutral packs (preview/prod/promotion).

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[Deploy request] --> Env{target?}
  Env -->|preview| P[pack.deploy.neutral.preview.v1]
  Env -->|prod| PR[pack.deploy.neutral.prod.v1]
  Env -->|promote| X[pack.deploy.neutral.promote_preview_to_prod.v1]
  P --> Done[Done]
  PR --> Done
  X --> Done
